: : Lunekill : :

The shots from Windlord and Nightlight strike Lunekill, knocking her around, but doing little real damage to her frame. The ultra-sonic attack needs to be brought to an end.


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Windlord?Nighlight::

Windlord varely avoided the shots and fired against Lunekill. 

Nightlight replied "Then they have to be stopped before shields fall" 
she managed to shot 2 energy balls against Lunekill and Rock seeker



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : Lunekill/Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Windlord's shot knocks Lunekill over, weak and distracted by the 
ultra-sonic attack. Lune manages to swing her arm around releasing 
short burst of energy blasts in directions all around her.
> 
> Rodimus pulls his wife close to him, keeping her down.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: I believe Elita will be safe. As for our situation, 
the base is taking a pounding. I dont know much longer the shields 
can hold out. It looks like we got one taken out with that ultra-
sonic sound. The other one is dangerously close to releasing a nano-
virus on himself that may stop him.
> 
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord/Nightlight:
> 
> windlord took advantage and shot against Lunekill. Nighlight 
arrieved 
> where Rodimus where and said "What's situations??? are Elita safe 
in 
> CR's area???? I left her inside one...."
> 
> 
> OOC: Cr's aarea is in center of base1
> 
>
